name: sysinfo
desc: Menampilkan informasi dasar sistem, OS, dan CPU.
author: Muhammad Zili

commands.default:
print('Usage: trm run sysinfo [all|os|cpu|py]
Menampilkan informasi sistem.')
commands.all:
import platform, os
try:
    user = os.getlogin()
except Exception:
    user = 'Unknown'
print(f'--- Info Sistem Lengkap ---')
print(f'OS           : {platform.system()} {platform.release()}')
print(f'Arsitektur   : {platform.machine()}')
print(f'Processor    : {platform.processor()}')
print(f'Versi Python : {platform.python_version()}')
print(f'Hostname     : {platform.node()}')
print(f'User         : {user}')
commands.os:
import platform
print(f'OS       : {platform.system()}')
print(f'Release  : {platform.release()}')
print(f'Versi    : {platform.version()}')
print(f'Hostname : {platform.node()}')
